commit message: Updated version to 0.91 - developer version
Removed a lot of legacy code and legacy depedencies to avoid den 65k method lmit
Queue items in the playlist are persisted
Bumped version
Better alignment of layout in the discovery tab
Changed FeedActivity to use the subscription URL in it's input intent
Converted to use the ISubscription interface many places in the app
Run OPML import/export toast msg on the main thread
Tweeked the UI of the navigation drawer to give other languages some more space
Made the resources in the notification android version specific
Made notification icon platform dependent
Merge branch 'master' into BetterDiscovery
Made foundation for displaying slim FeedActivities in the Discovery tab
Extended the Slim object to be transfered with a bundle to the FeedActivity
Removed the Settings button from the navigation drawer, according to the UI guidelines
Removed legacy files
Enabled minify using proguard.
Added Retrofit to the project
Return a SlimSubsciption when returning from parsing a feed
Did all the plumping for opening a feedview with a Slim subscription. However, it is still untested and full of bugs
Parsed the intent with the SlimSubscription inside the FeedActivity
Added certificate pin
Added secure http client which is pinned to a certificate
Added simple retrofit api for fetching a podcast
Ensured we always are running the player service in the foreground when playing something
Mitigated potential memory leak by making the PlayerHandler static
Make sure the notification is always running in the foreground
Hack together som basic metadata transfer to get the FeedActivity up when a Podcast is picked in the discovery tab
Fixed episode binding in search results
Rewrote the PaletteCache to an event base PaletteHelper
Updated build tools to version 22
Added a comment to the 'cast' string
Removed legacy code
Fixed issue where feeds url's would be overwritten by their webpage url
Added progress dialog while loading the podcast content
Fixed various issues in the DiscoveryFeedActivity
Increased default player size
Added Title and description to the top player
Added palette colors to the expanded playlist items
Removed fading text and made the text color background dependent
Removed the notification control setting
Updated fresco to 0.4
Added option to swithc between gPodder and iTunes for searching
Added clear playlist to the navigation drawer
Added UI for displaying the playlist position in the upper right corner of the playlist
Minor code cleanup
Removed the playlist position indicator prior to release
Updated translations
Bumped version to 0.92
